greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = A007814(n) + A036987(n-1) + 1.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
formula: a(2^k) = k+2; a(2^k + 2^(k-1)) = k. - _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Mar 02 2008
mathematica: a[n_] := 1 + IntegerExponent[n, 2] + Sum[(-1)^(n - k - 1)*Binomial[n - 1, k]* Sum[Binomial[k, 2^j - 1], {j, 0, k}], {k, 0, n - 1}]; Table[a[n], {n, 1, 25}] (* _G. C. Greubel_, Oct 17 2016 *)
program: (PARI) a(n)=my(t=valuation(n, 2)); t + (n==2^t) + 1 \\ _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Oct 17 2016
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Mar 01 2008
